MM

Michael Miller

Founder & Principal Investigator

Michael Miller is the founder and principal investigator of MILLERGROUP Intelligence, Inc. With an extensive background in law enforcement and private investigation, Michael brings a unique combination of tactical expertise and strategic thinking to every case.

Professional Background

Prior to founding MILLERGROUP, Michael worked with Gavin de Becker & Associates, one of the nation's premier threat assessment and protection firms. This experience provided him with unparalleled insight into high-stakes investigation and security operations.

Michael's law enforcement background includes specialized training in criminal investigation, surveillance techniques, and threat assessment. He has conducted investigations across multiple jurisdictions and handled sensitive cases requiring discretion and expertise.

Expertise

  • Threat Assessment & Management
  • Complex Investigation Strategy
  • Executive Protection Planning
  • Law Enforcement Liaison
  • Crisis Response & Management

Licenses & Certifications

  • UT License: Private Investigator P110771
